name: Kapitalist Pigs Shall Fear Our Shadow People!
name_original: Kapitalist Pigs Shall Fear Our Shadow People!
description:
Comrade! We've done it; we've discovered how to interact with the shadow people via the shadows! It is only a matter of time until we can use this newfound technology to invade capitalist society. To get there we need to figure out how to best use these shadow people, and that's where you come in!

Kill as many shadow people as it takes to master this new realm.

Good luck, and remember, failure means you go to the Gulag!

How to Play/Controls

Use your mouse to drag around the various blocks in order to manipulate the shadows. A "shadow person" will then try to navigate these shadows. Get them to the star!


Tips

Potential spoilers below!

  • There are 3 ways to kill a shadow person. If you're struggling or the third, think outside the box
  • If you're stuck on a level, don't forget you can skip! The game only slightly mocks you for it.
  • Most puzzles have several potential solutions. Get creative!
  • It is highly advised to play the game in a Chromium browser due to Unity optimizations for it.

Game made in ~3 days for Wowie Jam 4.
